name: Virtual Pet Banabs!
description: In this game, you will have to feed and play with a banana-like creature called a Banab to keep it alive and healthy! There are 3 secrets hidden in this game. By asking (or right-clicking) the Banab, he can give you hints on how to even find the secrets. Click and drag a set of different types of bugs from the bag full of bugs, and you can use the arrow keys to move the Banab in the little minigame!
